title: Last Ball Standing
description: Last Ball Standing is a multiplayer pool-themed game where players receive random pool ball numbers and must eliminate all but their own. Built with Next.js, React, and TailwindCSS, the game features a randomized ball distribution, turn-based mechanics, and a simple yet engaging UI.

title: Svartsjö Gård
description: Svartsjö Gård is my parents farm located just northeast of Mjöhult. This website provides information and photos of the farm. Visitors can explore a gallery of images and learn more about the history of the farm.
